com.kx
Class Type

java.lang.Object
  com.kx.Type

public final class Type
extends java.lang.Object

This class is a dumping ground for static methods and values from the legacy implementation.

See Also:
Interfacing With Java at code.kx

typeOf

public static int typeOf(java.lang.Object x)
Given an object, what is the appropriate kdb+ type tag? The kdb+ connection is that negative type tags are scalar values while positive ones are vectors. There are a number of special cases. Notably, Flips, Dicts, and general lists.

Parameters:
x - some object
Returns:
the appropriate kdb+ type tag
